Posts.Content: Thanks for letting us know, we shall keep it with that format.
Posts.Signature: Woman are recovering from breast cancer with the right Breast Cancer Information here http://www.longer-living.com/breast_cancer/ , proper exercise and diet practices, learn how they are doing it exactly with the information contained here.
Posts.Title: READ THIS BEFORE POSTING

Posts.Content: That's sad, I'm sorry to hear this. walking is a good thing to do though. My Grampa actually died from breast cancer, I think he got it from working around PCB chemicals his whole life. But yeah, just like this article I found http://www.longer-living.com/breast_...st_cancer.html Walking is always an easy thing you can do to help prevent breast cancer.
Posts.Title: 60 mile walk for breast cancer
